name: Slava Kim
body:
![My Head](http://www.meteor.com/people/slava.jpg)

# I am Slava, another software engineer from Silicon Valley.

Buzzword bingo is following

***

## Tech savvy

I spend my evenings watching SICP videos, reading The Dragon Book and revisiting favourite chapters of CLRS. Two years ago I would spend my friday evening on a TopCoder round.

## Startups kid

My current gig is a YC company of 13 people. The one before was 4 guys hacker house with pool!

## Hipster technologies included

I write my code in JavaScript, know how to use MongoDB, have no experience with SQL but if I choose one it would be Postgresql!

All my webapps are written in Meteor, I might even use CoffeeScript and will definitely choose ElasticSearch as a full-text search solution. What else can I through in these apps? Redis, RethinkDB, Doozer and PhoneGap? Sounds good.

## Typical Silicon Valley kid

No college, just passion and vision, you know.

## Religious

Vim only, Emacs free. I even own books on Vim and I spent hours in the Internet arguing it is the editor *real programmers* use!

## Have my setup

MBP, Thunderbolt display, Kinesis Advantage keyboard and a convertible standing desk - this is the standard in my company!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
